name: Verify user is able to download all excel report

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to download all excel report ({Store=UAE L2, Start Date=01-01-2022, Level=Level2, Product Category=Vaccine Routine, Storage Temperature=+5C Capacity, Start Month=08-2022})
